section.title: Champion
section.p: Provide information about the champion. If the proposal is submitted by a subcommittee, include the name of the point person. He or she should have prepared this proposal and thoroughly understand all of the content. The point person must be present at the TC calls when this proposal is discussed.

section.title: Modified specification documentation
section.p: Provide a listing of new or modified topics. For existing topics, provide the location of the DITA 1.2 topic; for new topics, suggest where you think the topic should be located in the TOC.

List the exact language suggested for the topics. For existing topics, you can use a table to compare the DITA 1.2 text and the proposed text for DITA 1.3. For new topics, use the templates nested within this topic.
